H0.text: what form of government does the united states have. Democracy

H1.text: what form of government does the united states have. Federal System

H2.text: what form of government does the united states have. Constitutional Government

H3.text: what form of government does the united states have. Republic

A4.text: The U.S. federal government is composed of three distinct branches: legislative, executive, and judicial.

A5.text: It is often described as a constitutional republic.

A6.text: The federal government shares sovereignty with each of the 50 states in their respective territories.

A7.text: the Constitution of the United States was largely based on federalism, republicanism and democracy.
